doctor.name: Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siraj
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Sexual Diseases Specialist & Laser Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Army Medical College, Bogura & Combined Military Hospital, Bogura
doctor.info: Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siraj is a Dermatologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, DVD, FCPS (Dermatology). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Dermatology & Venereology at Army Medical College, Bogura & Combined Military Hospital, Bogura. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Shahjahan Siraj at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 9pm (Sat to Wed), 10am to 3pm (Fri).

chamber.address: Room 802 (New Building), Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Rozina Afroz
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Rozina Afroz is a Dermatologist in Bogra. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Dermatology & Venereology). She is a Assistant Professor, Dermatology & Venereology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Rozina Afroz at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 7pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 1pm (Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidul Islam
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidul Islam is a Dermatologist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), DD (Thailand). He is a Ex. Professor, Dermatology & Venereology at TMSS Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Bogura Skin Care. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidul Islam at Bogura Skin Care is 11am to 3pm & 7.30pm to 10pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: Nahar Villa, Mofiz Paglar Mor, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Renu Gupta Joyaa
doctor.info: Dr. Renu Gupta Joyaa is a Skin Specialist in Bogra. Her qualification is MBBS, DDV (BSMMU). She is a Assistant Professor, Dermatology & Venereology at TMSS Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Doctors Clinic, Bogura. Practicing hour of Dr. Renu Gupta Joyaa at Doctors Clinic, Bogura is 4pm to 10pm (Sat to Thu) & 11am to 12pm (Fri).
